thread.title: Stacy Schiff’s ‘The Witches’ Shines a Torch on Salem Trials

title: Stacy Schiff’s ‘The Witches’ Shines a Torch on Salem Trials
text:
Published By: NYTimes Books - Today 
The Pulitzer Prize-winning author explores the mass hysteria that engulfed the Massachusetts Bay Colony in 1692 and resulted in 19 hangings....
